original_text: There will never be peace for wicked people.’ That is what my God says. There will never be peace for wicked people.’
korean_text: 내 하나님의 말씀에 악인에게는 평강이 없다 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: There will never be peace for wicked people.'
That is what my God says.
There will never be peace for wicked people.'
